entry.title: neuherbs Milk Thistle Capsules supplement for Men and Women with 800 MG Of Silymarin and Preservative Free for Healthy Liver & promote Skin Health
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Vitamins & Minerals
Price: 694.00

neuherbs promising Milk Thistle capsule, a natural herb flower, contains an active ingredient-silymarin. It has natural properties to maintain liver health by detoxifying it.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Milk Thistle For Liver Protection

    To help manage liver by the negative impacts of excessive alcohol & smoking.

  • Milk Thistle to Promote Detoxification

    Milk thistle for liver help reduce the effects of excess regular medication & antibiotics by flushing out toxins from the liver.

  • Milk Thistle For Skin

    Silymarin in milk thistle which works as an antioxidant helps reduce inflammation from the body that may promote skin health.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Milk Thistle Extract

    For liver detoxification.

  • 80% Silymarin

    To provide you high potency for better results.

  • Preservative Free

    To deliver you a better quality product.

— How To Use —

  • Take one capsule

  • With 1 glass of water

  • Twice a day 30 minutes after meal

  • It is a homeopathic medicine?

    neuherbs Milk thistle is a nutraceutical supplement made with natural herb - Milk Thistle. Milk thistle contains an active ingredient silymarin (antioxidant), known to help maintain liver health. neuherbs Milk Thistle offers you high potency milk thistle extract (1000mg) with 80% (800mg) of silymarin to support liver health.

  • Does it increase appetite?

    Milk Thistle is a natural herb supporting and maintaining liver health. It has an active ingredient known as silymarin, having anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties. It helps maintain the body's detoxification, liver functioning and may aid in weight management.

  • Does it help detoxify liver?

    Yes, Milk thistle is a natural herb which helps detoxify liver and flush out toxins from the liver.

  • Is it helpful if I am taking alcohol?

    Yes, milk thistle helps manage the liver damage caused by excess alcohol intake.

  • Is the capsule shell veg or non-veg?

    neuherbs milk Thistle is made up of veg capsule shell.

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Milk Thistle is best before 18 months from the date of manufacture.

  • How much mg of silymarin would I get per serving?

    neuherbs Milk Thistle capsule provides 800 mg of silyamrin per serving i.e., 2 capsules
